channel.title: [Code Help] 3 column file read (l3ethal blade you could probly get this)
channel.description: im trying to setup a 3 column file read that reads from a cfg file so i figured id just copy one of the other ones but their all a few columns more than i need so my question is can you just take out token3 and leave it just 1 2 2-2 or do you need 3 in their?

item.title: [Code Help] 3 column file read (l3ethal blade you could probly get this)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

it might help to explain what im trying to do im trying to take all the npc walkable and non walkable places in the npchandler and making it load from a cfg file so i need 3 columns column 1 for 1 or 2 for walkable or nonwalble column 2 for x-coord column 3 for y-coord

Read full topic
item.source: [Code Help] 3 column file read (l3ethal blade you could probly get this)

item.title: [Code Help] 3 column file read (l3ethal blade you could probly get this)
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

Less colmns you would change the number in the String token array is that what you mean?? token3 is the actual string that is initialized within the reader. I mean you don’t need it its just what I’ve always been using since I first used Whitescape.

Read full topic

item.title: [Code Help] 3 column file read (l3ethal blade you could probly get this)
item.dc:creator: @Fasga Fasga
item.description:
@Fasga wrote:

Well, i dont think i know what your talking about, but couldnt you just do this?

while(line != null && i < 3) { line = buffer.readLine(); Dostuffwithline i++; }

I’m not sure if thats what you meant.

Read full topic
